title: If any highway / ring road / express way and any other classified road is notified by State / Central Government Highway Authority under the provisions of relevant act, then the alignment of such notified road shall be deemed to be the part of Regional Plan and for this, procedure under section 20 of M
clause_text: If any highway / ring road / express way and any other classified road is notified by State / Central Government Highway Authority under the provisions of relevant act, then the alignment of such notified road shall be deemed to be the part of Regional Plan and for this, procedure under section 20 of M.R. & T.P. Act, 1966 shall not be necessary.
section: Highways notified by State / Central Government

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
